advantages: Biological combat units gain 100% increased life.
disadvantages: MULEs are unavailable.

advantages: Ignite Afterburners additionally increases attack speed by 100%. Cooldown reduced by 50%.
disadvantages: Units no longer cost less. Ignite Afterburners costs 10 life and its movement speed bonus is reduced to 50%.

advantages: The Starport, Armory, and Orbital Command no longer have tech requirements. The Starport no longer has gas cost and its units cost 30% less gas. Vikings, Banshees, and Battlecruisers increase top bar cooldown rates by 1% per supply used.
disadvantages: Combat units cost 50% more minerals.

advantages: Malignant Creep effectiveness increased by 100%. Queens are no longer slowed and may place Creep Tumors while off creep.
disadvantages: Nidus and Omega Networks are unavailable.

advantages: Kerrigan expends stacks of Fury while using Leaping Strike or Psionic Shift, striking nearby enemies for 50 damage and stunning them for 3 seconds.
disadvantages: Kerrigan's carapace generation reduced by 50%. Kerrigan's ability damage reduced by 50%.

advantages: Assimilation Aura resource drops increased by 100%. Kerrigan gains Kinetic Blast and Crushing Grip.
disadvantages: Leaping Strike and Psionic Shift are unavailable.

advantages: Increases the effectiveness of all combat unit abilities by 100%.
disadvantages: Combat units cost 30% more.

advantages: Upon use, Project Power Field warps out any of your combat units standing in an existing power field projection into the new location. Cooldown removed.
disadvantages: Project Power Field costs 25 energy.

advantages: Orbital Strikes warp in Unbound Fanatics that throw off damaging energy and last 15 seconds. Shield Overcharge is now targeted, has its cooldown reduced by 50%, and costs 25 energy.
disadvantages: Orbital Strike costs 50 energy. Guardian Shell is disabled.

advantages: The Laser Drill deals 100% splash damage, slows movement speed by 70%, and locks on targets 50% faster.
disadvantages: The Laser Drill abilities are unavailable.

advantages: Turret upgrades are 100% more effective.
disadvantages: Combat units cost 50% more or less than gas.

advantages: Hercules have twice the cargo capacity and unload units instantly. Science Vessels can use Tactical Jump and its cooldown is reduced by 50%.
disadvantages: Top bar cooldowns increased by 50%.

advantages: Max supply increased by 50%. Zerglings and Scourge spawn an extra unit per egg. Banelings will spawn an additional three free Banelings, and Scourge Nests will spawn four free Scourge.
disadvantages: Zagara is unavailable.

advantages: Aberrations and Corruptors cost 25% less, gain 50% increased health, and possess greatly increased health regeneration.
disadvantages: No free Banelings.

advantages: Zagara gains reduced ability cooldowns, increased health and energy regeneration, and access to the Deep Tunnel ability.
disadvantages: Mass Frenzy only affects Zagara and her summons. Combat units cost 25% more.

advantages: Time Stop becomes targeted. All Shadow Guard who have died are resurrected at the target location.
disadvantages: Shadow Guard duration reduced by 40%.

advantages: Emergency Recall recalls cloaked units to the closest Nexus or Dark Pylon instead of the primary structure and heals life and shields to full. Deploy Dark Pylon cooldown and cost reduced by 50%.
disadvantages: Dark Pylons lose Recall.

advantages: Void Stasis, Confusion, Stasis Ward, Disruption Web, and Dark Coil may affect heroic units and cause enemies to lose 20 life per second. This effect cannot kill.
disadvantages: Combat units deal 25% reduced damage. Stasis Ward duration reduced by 75%.

advantages: Repair Beam is 100% more effective and can target twice as many structures. Unity Barrier affects structures and its cooldown is reduced by 75%. Chrono Boost, Chrono Wave, and Chrono Field affect defensive structures, increasing their rate of attack.
disadvantages: Repair Beam may only target structures. Unity Barrier no longer affects units.

advantages: Combat unit cost reduced by 40%.
disadvantages: Photon Cannons and Khaydarin Monoliths are unavailable.

advantages: Orbital Strike and Solar Lance energy cost reduced by 40%. Solar Lance and Purifier Beam cooldowns reduced by 50%.
disadvantages: Chrono Boost, Chrono Wave, and Chrono Field are unavailable.

advantages: Combat units can hold an additional 25 Biomass and have an additional 50% chance to drop their Biomass upon death.
disadvantages: Ultimate Evolutions are unavailable.

advantages: Locusts have 50% increased attack range, movement speed, and duration. The Deep Tunnel upgrade no longer requires Hive, no longer requires vision, and can be used by Roaches and Ravagers.
disadvantages: Combat units cost 25% more vespane gas.

advantages: The number of Ultimate Evolutions is no longer limited to 3.
disadvantages: Ultimate Evolution requires 200 Biomass. Biomass is less powerful.

advantages: When a Supplicant dies, it increases the damage and attack speed of one of Alarak's nearby non-heroic mechanical combat units.
disadvantages: Deadly Charge and Destruction Wave damage reduced by 50%.

advantages: Empower Me cooldown reduced by 50%.
disadvantages: The Death Fleet is unavailable.

advantages: Summon Death Fleet has no duration or initial cooldown. The mothership may construct Destroyers.
disadvantages: Destroyers are no longer summoned with the Mothership. The Mothership and Destroyers have resource and supply costs. Mass Teleport now has a 60 second cooldown and no longer teleports allied units.

advantages: Factory and Starport no longer have tech requirements. Unit charges accure 100% faster for the first production structure built.
disadvantages: Unit charges accure 50% slower for the second and third production structures built.

advantages: Tactical Airlift cooldown reduced by 75%.
disadvantages: Griffin Airstrike cooldown increased by 300%.

advantages: Nova gains permanent Super Cloak. Her abilities have 50% increased radius and 50% reduced cooldown.
disadvantages: Nova cannot switch to her combat Suit and loses Super Cloak 5 seconds upon attacking or using Snipe.

advantages: Banshees can load up to 16 Infested infantry and can launch their cargo at a ground target.
disadvantages: Infested Civilians have 30% reduced timed life.

advantages: Factory and Starport no longer have tech requirements. Mechanical combat units cost 30% less. Automated Mitosis generates Infested Siege Tank ammunition 200% faster.
disadvantages: The Infested Colonist Compound does not spawn and connot be built.

advantages: Infested Bunkers spawn Infested Troopers 200% faster.
disadvantages: Infested Bunkers no longer have cargo capacity.

advantages: All armor Suit damage increased by 100%. Ability cooldowns reduced by 50%. Life, shield and energy regeneration increased by 100% while in storage.
disadvantages: All Armor Suit calldown cooldowns increased by 700%. Each suit can only be sustained for 20 seconds at a time.

advantages: Tactical Data Web effectiveness increased by 200%. All combat unit costs reduced by 50%.
disadvantages: All non-heroic combat unit damage reduced by 50% and vitals reduced by 50%.

advantages: Averaging Protocol effectiveness increased by 100%. Champion A.I.s that die refund 75% of their base unit cost.
disadvantages: Champion A.I.s do not gain additional life or shields and have reduced attack range.

advantages: Devour applies its benefits to all nearby friendly units.
disadvantages: Dehaka has O base armor, loses the Scorching Breath ability, and has his max level reduced by 4,

advantages: Pack leaders and their entourage deal 50% more damage and have 100% increased life. Pack Leader cooldowns reduced by 33%. Pack Leaders can consume Essence for Dehaka.
disadvantages: Dehaka exits the map while a Pack Leader is active. Only one Pack Leader may be active at a time.

advantages: Dehaka spawns a clone.
disadvantages: If either Dehaka or the clone dies, the other dies as well.

advantages: Mag Mines arm and fire 80% faster. Mira's unit's on-death effects are 100% more effective.
disadvantages: Horner's units cost 30% more.

advantages: Horner's units' vespane gas costs reduced by 20% and charge cooldowns reduced by 50%.
disadvantages: Galleons are capped at 2.

advantages: Bombing Platforms are no longer capped.
disadvantages: Bombing Platforms cost 100% more.

advantages: Outlaws' active ability cooldowns reduced by 35%.
disadvantages: Outlaw cost and time between Outlaw recruitment increased by 50%.

advantages: When beyond the vision range of all other Outlaws, Outlaws deal 30% more damage for each Outlaw recruited and take 50% less damage.
disadvantages: Ultimate Gear is unavailable. Gear costs 25% more.

advantages: The Odin no longer requires Tychus as its pilot, its duration is increased by 100%, and its cooldown is reduced by 40%.
disadvantages: Barrage and Big Red Button are unavailable.

advantages: Zeratul can deploy the Void Seeker, granting all friendly units in a target area Super Cloak for 15 seconds.
disadvantages: The Void Seeker can no longer transport Zeratul.

advantages: Zeratul can collect an unlimited number of Artiface Fragments.
disadvantages: Zeratul's combat units cost 25% more.

advantages: Each collected Artifact Fragment reduces the cooldown of Zeratul's Shadow Cleave by 5 seconds. Shadow Cleave spawns a tornado that damages and slows enemy units.
disadvantages: Zeratul can only collect up to two Artifact Fragments.

advantages: Satellites are invulnerable once they are online. Satellites generate a 50% larger Statzone.
disadvantages: Super Gary is unavailable.

advantages: Gary's health and damage increased by 100%.
disadvantages: Gary's movement speed is reduced by 90% outside Stetzones.

advantages: Combat units gain a stack of The Best Oil when they kill an enemy unit.
disadvantages: Combat units cost 40% more minerals. Mecha Infestors are unavailable.

advantages: Contaminated Strike's fear lasts 200% longer, its damage-over-time effect additionally increases damage received by 25%, its cost is reduced by 20%, and its cooldown is reduced by 66%. Troopers provide Imperial Support while operating Earthsplitter Ordnance.
disadvantages: Nuclear Anihilation is unavailable.

advantages: Royal Guard vespane gas costs reduced by 25% and XP gain increased by 100%.
disadvantages: Royal Guard mineral costs increased by 100% and supply cost increased by 50%.

advantages: Equipped Troopers activate a self-destruct mechanism in their weapons upon death. Trooper weapons cost 40 minerals and 20 vespane gas.
disadvantages: Troopers no longer drop weapons. Imperial Intercessors are unavailable.
